doc:
David Morley (musician) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Morley_(musician) 0 David Morley (born 6 August 1965 in London, England) was a child actor, and most notably featured in Stanley Kubrick's Barry Lyndon.Morley now lives in Belgium, where he works as an electronic musician and producer. He was the in-house engineer for R Records in the 1980s and 1990s. He worked with DJ Andrea Parker for many years, co-writing and producing her album Kiss My Arp and many of her other releases.He has released four of his own albums: Tilted, Ghosts, Sanctum. and The Origin of Storms David_Morley ( born_6_August_1965 in London , England ) was a_child_actor , and most_notably featured in Stanley_Kubrick 's_Barry_Lyndon.Morley now lives in Belgium , where he works as an_electronic_musician_and_producer . He was the_in-house_engineer for R in the_1980s_and_1990s . He worked with DJ_Andrea_Parker for many_years , co-writing_and_producing her_album Kiss My_Arp and many of her_other_releases.He has_released four of his_own_albums : Tilted , Ghosts , Sanctum . and
